00109 #define CHKRESULT(command)              if((rlt = CheckResult(command)).details) return rlt
00110 #define CHKALLOC(alloc)                 if(!(alloc)) return ERR(E_OUTOFMEMORY) //EDIT: Consider using a string here, because the

00128 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 // Name: Point
00130 // Desc: Simple point representation with variable type
00131 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 template<class type> struct Point
00133 {
00134         type x, y;
00135 
00136         Point(){};
00137         Point(type x, type y)
00138         {
00139                 this->x = x;
00140                 this->y = y;
00141         }
00142         bool operator==(const Point<type>& p)
00143         {
00144                 return this->x == p.x && this->y == p.y;
00145         }
00146         bool operator!=(const Point<type>& p)
00147         {
00148                 return this->x != p.x || this->y != p.y;
00149         }
00150 };
00151 
00152 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 // Name: Size
00154 // Desc: Simple size representation with variable type
00155 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 template<class type> struct Size
00157 {
00158         type width, height;
00159 
00160         Size(){};
00161         Size(type width, type height)
00162         {
00163                 this->width = width;
00164                 this->height = height;
00165         }
00166         bool operator==(const Size<type>& s)
00167         {
00168                 return this->width == s.width && this->height == s.height;
00169         }
00170         bool operator!=(const Size<type>& s)
00171         {
00172                 return this->width != s.width || this->height != s.height;
00173         }
00174 };

00197                 this->height = size.height;

00207         {
00208                 this->x = 0;
00209                 this->y = 0;
00210                 this->width = width;
00211                 this->height = height;
00212         };

00214         {
00215                 return x;
00216         };
00217         __forceinline type top()

00219                 return y;
00220         };
00221         __forceinline type right()
00222         {
00223                 return x + width;
00224         };
00225         __forceinline type bottom()
00226         {
